[03] 136^b^.^eb^ ``mama ^a^M0.0018^ea^ ca, bhante, vacanena bhagavato pāde sirasā vandeyyāsi -- `uttarā nāma, bhante, upāsikā bhagavato pāde sirasā vandatī'ti. anacchariyaṃ kho panetaṃ, bhante, yaṃ maṃ bhagavā aññatarasmiṃ sāmaññaphale byākareyya {byākareyyāti (?)}, taṃ bhagavā sakadāgāmiphale byākāsī''ti.
[21] ``yuttā ^a^P0.0017^ea^ ca te paramālaṅkatā hayā, adhomukhā aghasigamā balī javā.
[22] abhinimmitā pañcarathāsatā ca te, anventi taṃ sārathicoditā hayā..
[21] ``sā tiṭṭhasi rathavare alaṅkatā, obhāsayaṃ jalamiva joti pāvako.
[22] pucchāmi taṃ varatanu {varacāru (katthaci)} anomadassane, kasmā nu kāyā anadhivaraṃ upāgami..
[21] ``kāmaggapattānaṃ ^a^V0.0014^ea^ yamāhunuttaraṃ {... nuttarā (ka0), anuttarā (syā0)}, nimmāya nimmāya ramanti devatā.
[22] tasmā kāyā accharā kāmavaṇṇinī, idhāgatā anadhivaraṃ namassituṃ..
[22] vaṇṇo ca te dasa disā virocati..
[22] nacce gīte paramasusikkhitā ahuṃ, sirimāti maṃ rājagahe avediṃsu {avedisuṃ (?)}..
[21] ``buddho ca me isinisabho vināyako, adesayī samudayadukkhaniccataṃ.
[22] sīlesvahaṃ paramasusaṃvutā ahuṃ, dhamme ṭhitā naravarabuddhadesite {bhāsite (sī0)}..

[21] ``pāraṃ samuddassa imañca vaṇṇuṃ {vanaṃ (syā0), vaṇṇaṃ (ka0)}, vettācaraṃ {vettaṃ paraṃ (syā0), vettācāraṃ (ka0)} saṅkupathañca maggaṃ.

[21] ``devo ^a^M0.0119^ea^ nu āsi udavāsi yakkho, udāhu devindo manussabhūto.

[21] ``mamaṃ pāyāsīti ahu samaññā, rajjaṃ yadā kārayiṃ kosalānaṃ.

[21] ``samaṇo ca kho āsi kumārakassapo, bahussuto cittakathī uḷāro.

[21] ``saccaṃ ^a^V0.0086^ea^ kirāhaṃsu narā sapaññā, anaññathā vacanaṃ paṇḍitānaṃ.

[21] ``yahiṃ yahiṃ sokapariddavo ca, vadho ca bandho ca parikkileso.

[21] ``ime ca sirīsavanā {ime sirīsūpavanā ca (sī0), imepi sirīsavanā ca (pī0 ka0)} tātā, dibbā {dibbā ca (pī0 ka0)} gandhā surabhī {surabhiṃ (sī0 ka0)} sampavanti {sampavāyanti (ka0)}.

[21] ``disvānahaṃ vassasatāni pañca, asmiṃ vimāne ṭhatvāna tātā.

[21] ``kathaṃ nu soceyya tathāvidho so, laddhā vimānaṃ atulaṃ cirāya.

[21] ``anucchaviṃ ovadiyañca me taṃ, yaṃ maṃ tumhe peyyavācaṃ vadetha.

[21] ``mā ceva serīsamahaṃ akattha, sabbañca vo bhavissati yaṃ vadetha.

[21] ``sañjānamāno ^a^M0.0122^ea^ na musā bhaṇeyya, parūpaghātāya na cetayeyya.

[21] ``maññe so mātāpitūnaṃ kāraṇā, bhogāni pariyesati na attahetu.

[21] ``ujū avaṅko asaṭho amāyo, na lesakappena ca vohareyya.

[21] ``taṃ ^a^V0.0087^ea^ kāraṇā pātukatomhi attanā, tasmā dhammaṃ passatha vāṇijāse.
